content.title: Adding Wait for the Second Test Case
content.body:
1. From the Test Case Recorder window, click Stop.
  2. From the Test Case Recorder canvas, click the + icon and select Wait.
  3. Modify the following fields:
    • Wait in ms: 2000
  4. From the top right corner of the Test Case Recorder Window screen, click Save.
    You have successfully created your second test case.
  5. Close the Test Case Recorder window.
